readme:
# WhatsApp MCP Server (Containerized)

This is the containerized version of the WhatsApp MCP server for Archestra.

## Setup

1. Install the server in Archestra
2. Check the container logs for a QR code (click the FileText icon)
3. Scan the QR code with your WhatsApp mobile app
4. The server will authenticate and be ready to use

## Authentication

On first run, you'll need to scan a QR code with your WhatsApp mobile app. The QR code will appear in the container logs.

**To view the QR code:**
1. Go to Settings â†’ MCP Servers
2. Find WhatsApp MCP Server
3. Click the FileText icon to view logs
4. Look for the ASCII QR code in the logs
5. Scan it with WhatsApp on your phone

Authentication lasts approximately 20 days, after which you'll need to scan a new QR code.

## Features

- Search and read WhatsApp messages
- Send messages to contacts and groups
- Search contacts
- Download media files
- Send media files (images, videos, documents, audio)

## Requirements

- WhatsApp mobile app for QR code scanning
- Active WhatsApp account
- Archestra with Go-enabled base image
